articles.title: The shortest day of the year is here. Here’s what to know.
articles.description:
Sunday is the shortest day of the year north of the equator, where the solstice marks the start of astronomical winter.

The post The shortest day of the year is here. Here’s what to know. appeared first on Boston.com.
